Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can government officials claim travel expenses according to the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Travel"?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, government officials who travel on business can also claim various travel expenses according to the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel", because these points apply to employees of various central government agencies and do not exclude political officials.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the travel expenses of students participating in off-campus competitions or activities be subsidized according to the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Travel"?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Travel expenses for students participating in off-campus competitions or activities cannot be directly subsidized according to the "Key Points for Domestic Travel Expense Claims" because these points are mainly for employees of various central government agencies. However, schools at all levels can follow the principle of various payment standards for in-service technicians and workers (personnel below the junior level) in accordance with their financial conditions and actual needs. As for the issue of verification and write-off of various expenses, it can also be handled with reference to the relevant provisions of this point.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can an individual or a representative unit apply for a travel subsidy when receiving an award?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When a representative agency receives an award, it is considered to be dealing with official business, and can receive travel expenses according to regulations. As for the individual award, if the award is for business, and the agency approves and dispatches it on a business trip, then you can also apply for a travel subsidy in accordance with the regulations.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can temporary specialist technicians be sent and paid for their travel expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, temporary specialist technicians can be dispatched and paid for their travel expenses. According to the provisions of item 3, paragraph 2 of the "Key Points for the Expenditure of Project Management Fees of Various Central Government Agencies", project management fees can be used for personnel expenses such as hiring temporary specialized technical personnel or hiring temporary supervisors, technicians, and handymen. As for the travel expenses they need, they can be covered by project management fees according to the provisions of paragraph 1 of the same point.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can expatriates apply for travel subsidy?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Dispatch personnel are not employees employed by government agencies, so they cannot apply for travel subsidy according to the "Key Points for Claiming Domestic Travel Expenses".

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: What is the method of requesting payment for dispatching business trips by dispatched personnel?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The dispatched personnel should consult with the relevant responsible authority for the method of requesting payment for the business trip. Because dispatched personnel are not employees employed by government agencies, they do not apply to the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel". The actual expenditure and pricing method shall be handled in accordance with the contract signed with the entrusting agency.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can non-central agency public servants who contract government projects apply for travel subsidies?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: For non-central agency public servants who contract government projects, whether travel expenses should be subject to the "Key Points for Domestic Travel and Travel Expenses" depends on the contract signed with the entrusting agency. Therefore, whether they can apply for a travel subsidy depends on the content of the contract with the entrusting agency.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can temporary personnel be sent on business trips or training workshops?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Temporary personnel may be sent on business trips or to participate in training seminars when it is necessary to do so. However, the reimbursement of relevant expenses must be verified in accordance with the regulations to verify the necessary expenses. All agencies and local governments should formulate relevant norms according to actual needs, budgetary quotas and financial conditions.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I take a public bus or MRT in the urban area during a business trip, can this part of the expenses be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When traveling on business, you can claim the transportation expenses for taking private passenger cars or MRT in the urban area. However, if you take a taxi, unless it is due to business needs and approved by the authority, the taxi fee cannot be reimbursed.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the handling fee of the train ticket be reported together with the fare as the transportation fee?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The handling fee of the train ticket cannot be reported as the transportation fee together with the fare. According to the provisions of point 2 of the "Domestic Travel Expense Reporting Points", the travel expenses are divided into transportation expenses, accommodation expenses and board and miscellaneous expenses. The handling fee for voice booking by the Railway Bureau and the sale of train tickets by the post office should belong to the category of miscellaneous expenses, so the transportation fee cannot be reported together with the ticket price.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I use my mobile phone to contact business during a business trip, can the phone bill be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: If you have already received the travel expenses, you can no longer apply for reimbursement of mobile phone contact expenses. However, if you have not received the business trip expenses, according to the key points for processing expenditure vouchers, you need to provide the documents approved by the agency and the payment receipt clearly separated from the personal communication to handle the expense report.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the entourage take the high-speed rail business car?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The situation of the entourage taking the high-speed rail business car is subject to the approval of the individual case and the authority. According to the "Domestic Business Travel Expense Reporting Points", those who can take the high-speed rail business car are limited to the heads and deputy heads of the ministries and corresponding ministries. If the head or deputy head has safety needs when taking the high-speed rail, it is up to each agency to decide whether to take the business car for the entourage based on its power and responsibility.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: When traveling domestically, can insurance be included in the travel expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: For domestic business trips, insurance premiums are not included in the travel expenses. Because the government already has the "Public and Educational Personnel Insurance Law" to provide life insurance for public servants who may be in danger when performing their duties. However, when traveling abroad, considering factors such as politics, public security, and geographical environment in some countries, the degree of risk is relatively high, so there are regulations that require additional insurance.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: When public servants with disabilities take the high-speed rail, can they take the business car like the head of the department?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When public servants with disabilities take the high-speed rail, they cannot take the business car like the head of the ministry. According to the provisions of Schedule 1 of the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Trips", the cockpit (carriage) claim for high-speed rail is based on the position level, not the fare. Therefore, public servants with disabilities should be handled in accordance with the above regulations.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the fare for respecting the elderly in the business carriage not exceed the fare of the general economy carriage?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Can't. According to the main points of domestic business trip travel expense reporting, the standard for reporting expenses is the cockpit (carriage) as the reporting basis, not the fare.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can I claim miscellaneous expenses and make up leave when I am on a business trip?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When traveling on business during holidays, you can claim miscellaneous expenses. As for whether you can make up time off, it needs to be determined according to the power and responsibility of the Human Resources and Administration Department of the Executive Yuan.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Are miscellaneous expenses paid in proportion to the number of business trips or in a fixed amount?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Miscellaneous expenses are paid according to the daily upper limit of 400 yuan, but each agency can set other reporting requirements within this range based on business characteristics or other factors, such as calculating expenses based on kilometers, hours, or business trip locations.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Are there half-day and full-day fees for incidentals?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The reporting standard for miscellaneous expenses is the daily upper limit. As for each agency, after consideration of business characteristics or other factors, they can formulate separate reimbursement regulations within this range, which may be calculated according to the number of kilometers, hours or business trip locations. Therefore, half-day and full-day miscellaneous expenses are subject to the regulations of each service agency.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Do incidental expenses have to be deducted from meal expenses to be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Miscellaneous expenses do not include meal expenses, so there is no need to deduct meal expenses for reimbursement.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the miscellaneous expenses be claimed only when the location of the agency is more than 60 kilometers away from the place of business trip?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: uncertain. According to the main points of domestic business trip travel expense reporting, each agency can formulate reimbursement regulations within this scope based on business characteristics or other factors, such as the calculation basis based on the number of kilometers, hours, or business trip location. The regulations about being more than 60 kilometers away from the location of the agency are actually aimed at the requirements for the payment of accommodation expenses, not the restrictions on the reporting of miscellaneous expenses. Therefore, when reporting miscellaneous expenses, all agencies should follow the relevant regulations set by them, or report expenses according to the daily standard.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: What matters should the HR Office be responsible for confirming when reviewing the domestic travel expense report form?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When reviewing the domestic travel expense report form, the personnel office needs to be responsible for confirming the following items: 1. Check whether it is approved; 2. Check the legitimacy and correctness of the fake; 3. Check whether the job grade used in the travel expense report is correct.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If the traveler does not submit the travel expense report form within 15 days, will they still have the opportunity to claim the travel expense?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Although regulations require business travelers to submit a travel expense report form within 15 days, if they fail to submit it on time, they can also be paid under the payment of annual budget-related funds, not limited to the actual travel year. However, if the delay in closing the report is due to human error, it is necessary to clarify the responsibilities of the relevant personnel before reporting the payment according to the situation.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If the business trip is carried out over two years, can the travel expenses be reported in the new annual budget?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, you can claim travel expenses in your new annual budget if the travel is carried out over two years. However, if there is a delay in closing the report due to human negligence, it may be necessary to sign the project to clarify the responsibilities of the relevant personnel before reporting the payment.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: How should the agency deal with the delay in closing the report due to human negligence?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: In the case of delayed reporting due to human negligence, the agency can sign off on a special case based on the specific situation, clarify the responsibilities of the relevant personnel, and then report the expenses based on the investigation results.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: When accompanying a foreign guest on a business trip, can the transportation and accommodation expenses be reimbursed according to the actual expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, when accompanying foreign guests on business trips, both transportation and accommodation expenses can be reimbursed according to the actual expenses. The transportation expenses shall be reported according to the means of transportation taken by the foreign guests, while the accommodation expenses shall be reported according to the unified invoice or receipt of the hotel where the foreign guests are staying. However, it should be noted that each agency also has its own internal regulations and budget constraints, so it is best to follow the relevant regulations of your agency.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: The so-called foreign guests refer to VIPs invited from abroad, right?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, the so-called foreign guests refer to VIPs invited from abroad.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: As the budget for recurring expenses shrinks year by year, does our agency need to formulate relevant internal regulations to deal with it?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, as the budget for recurrent expenses is shrinking year by year, all agencies need to formulate relevant internal regulations to deal with it. After weighing the actual situation and approving the necessary funds, please follow the relevant regulations of your institution.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Under actual conditions, can we approve the necessary funds? Or should it be handled in accordance with the relevant regulations of the agency?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: In the actual situation, you can consider the actual situation to approve the necessary funds, but you still have to follow the relevant regulations of your agency.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: When I am transferred, will the travel expenses be reported to the new agency?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, the travel expenses during the transfer must be reported to the new office.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the spouse and immediate family members of the transferee follow the transfer and pay the transportation expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, when the spouse and immediate family members of the transferee follow the transfer, they can report the transportation expenses according to the job level of the transferee.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can transferees be reimbursed for accommodation and board miscellaneous expenses the day before they report for duty?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: If the distance between the original agency and the new agency is more than 60 kilometers on the day before the report, the transferee can report for accommodation and miscellaneous expenses (the current regulations do not include board expenses).

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the transportation expenses of personnel stationed in outer islands to return to Taiwan for vacation be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The transportation expenses of the personnel stationed on the outer islands returning to Taiwan for vacation cannot be reimbursed, because the current regulations do not mention that the transportation expenses required for returning to Taiwan for vacation after being transferred due to the work location is too far away can be reimbursed. The agency should provide necessary assistance in the relevant regulations on manpower deployment support to clarify the rights and obligations of both parties.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If the business trip exceeds 60 kilometers but no accommodation is provided, can I claim the accommodation fee?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: If the business trip exceeds 60 kilometers, but there is no fact of accommodation, the accommodation fee cannot be reported.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If the business trip spans a holiday, can the accommodation expenses on the second day of the week be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Whether a holiday can be claimed during a business trip depends on the service agency's approval of the itinerary according to the nature of the business trip.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I choose to go to and from the place of business trip every day, can I report the transportation expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, if you choose to go to and from the place of business trip every day, the transportation expenses can be reimbursed. If the itinerary approved by the agency is a daily commute, travel expenses can be reported according to the main points of domestic travel expenses. The location of the agency and the place of business trip shall be used as the start and end point of the report for transportation expenses, and the report shall be verified according to the route that must be passed during the business trip. If the traveler travels from his residence to the place of business travel along the way and saves public funds, the transportation expenses shall be reimbursed according to the actual expenses incurred.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Since participating in the seminar requires remittance to pay the accommodation fee, can the handling fee incurred be reimbursed for travel expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Miscellaneous expenses are used for official business expenses such as business contacts, short-distance fares, fax or photocopying. ∙If the inquiry is of a business trip nature, since the handling fee for the remittance and transfer of the accommodation fee is included in the miscellaneous expenses, repeated reporting is not allowed. However, if it is of the nature of training or lectures, the handling fee is not included in the subsidy.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I receive a notice of cancellation of a meeting during a business trip, can the paid reservation fee be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: According to the provisions of the General Office of Accounting and Accounting of the Executive Yuan, if the trip cannot be made for some reason during the business trip, the paid room reservation fee and other expenses can be reported within the originally approved business trip funds as long as it is determined that the reason is not due to the responsibility of the person concerned and strictly determined by the agency. . Therefore, if you receive a notice of the cancellation of the meeting when you are on a business trip, and the paid reservation fee is indeed caused by uncontrollable reasons, it should be reimbursed if it is confirmed by the agency.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: During the business trip, if you stay across counties and cities, if the place of accommodation is not a necessary route during the business trip, can the extra transportation expenses spent between the place of business trip and the place of accommodation be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Can't. If you stay across counties and cities during the business trip, the place of accommodation is not a necessary route for the business trip, and the extra transportation expenses from the place of business trip to the place of accommodation cannot be reimbursed.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If a business trip takes a detour due to personal reasons, can the actual transportation expenses be reimbursed within the scope of the original direct transportation expenses to the destination?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, if you detour due to personal reasons during your business trip, you can reimburse the actual transportation expenses as long as the transportation expenses to the destination directly do not exceed the original transportation expenses. However, it should be noted that the transportation fee must be calculated according to the route that must be passed during the business trip.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: When returning from a business trip from a non-essential drop-in location, the fare after verification should not exceed the required drop-in fare, so can the transportation expenses for the non-essential drop-in section be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When returning from a business trip from a non-essential drop-in location, the fare after verification should not exceed the required drop-in fare. As for the transportation expenses on non-essential road sections, because they do not meet the regulations, they cannot be reimbursed under normal circumstances. However, if there are special circumstances that make it impossible to drop by, and with the approval of the agency, the increased expenses can be reimbursed.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I need to take the high-speed rail for business trips, can the additional transportation expenses between the office location and the high-speed rail station be reimbursed?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: If you really need to take the high-speed rail because of work, and the authority has approved it, the additional transportation expenses from the authority's location to the high-speed rail station can be reimbursed.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Should the travel expense report be based on the location of the agency as the origin and destination of the report? And calculate it according to the way you must pass through on a business trip?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, the travel expense claim should be based on the location of the agency as the starting and ending point of the claim, and calculated according to the route that must be passed during the business trip.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If you encounter a sudden serious illness and need to be hospitalized during a business trip, how many days can the miscellaneous expenses be reported at most?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: If you encounter a sudden serious illness and need to be hospitalized during a business trip, the miscellaneous expenses can be reimbursed for up to 10 days.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If a car accident occurs during a business trip and I am hospitalized, can I claim the miscellaneous expenses in accordance with the travel expenses rules for domestic business trips?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, if a car accident or hospitalization occurs during a business trip, after it is proved to be true, the miscellaneous expenses can be reported according to the domestic business travel rules. However, it should be noted that the reporting of miscellaneous expenses can only be paid for up to 10 days.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can employees who travel for a long time receive travel expenses during their public holiday recuperation due to a car accident?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Whether employees on long-term business trips can receive travel expenses during the public holidays approved by the agency after the car accident depends on the necessity and rationality of each case. However, within the first 10 days of the sick hospitalization period, miscellaneous expenses can be paid on a daily basis. Travel expenses cannot be claimed during the period of convalescence after discharge from the hospital. As for local governments, they can refer to the regulations of the central government and deal with them according to their own powers and responsibilities.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: With regard to the identification of "frequent business trips", is it determined by each agency based on the actual situation and needs?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, with regard to the identification of "frequent business trips", due to the different missions and business nature of each agency, each agency is authorized to make its own judgment according to their actual situation and needs.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can personnel assigned to work on outlying islands apply for board and miscellaneous expenses and regional allowances during the support period according to the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel"?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Personnel assigned to work on outer islands are not considered to be on business trips, so they cannot apply for food and miscellaneous expenses during the support period according to the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Trips". As for the geographical allowance, according to the remarks in the "Regional Addition Form for Public and Educational Employees of Various Agencies and Schools", the additional objects are limited to employees within the establishment of each institution and school, or employees within the establishment whose business needs to be dispatched to other regions to perform duties for more than one month. If you meet the above conditions, you can refer to the relevant regulations. If you have any doubts, you can contact the Human Resources and Administration Department of the competent authority.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can a person who has been stationed on an outlying island for a long-term vacation return to Taiwan apply for reimbursement of transportation expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: There is no relevant provision for travel expenses for returning to Taiwan for vacation. According to the first point of the domestic business trip travel expenses reporting points, the employees of the central government agencies are required to report travel expenses on official business trips, and the transfer is regarded as a business trip. However, there is no provision for reimbursement for the transportation expenses required for returning to Taiwan for vacation after being transferred because the work location is too far away. Therefore, the agency should describe the necessary assistance provided for the transfer work in the relevant regulations on manpower transfer support, so as to clarify the relationship between the rights and obligations of both parties.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: What do "permanent personnel stationed abroad" and "relevant competent authorities" refer to?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: "Personnel stationed abroad for a long time" refers to personnel who are assigned to work in other regions for a long time due to work needs. And "each competent authority" refers to the superior competent authority of each authority. Because the tasks and business nature of different agencies are different, it is impossible to use the same regulations to regulate all agencies. Therefore, each competent agency needs to identify "long-term personnel stationed abroad" according to its own actual situation and needs.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Do agencies need to report to this office (now the head office) for approval or future reference when formulating travel expense reporting regulations?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When formulating travel expenses reporting regulations, various agencies do not need to report to the Division (now the Headquarters) for approval or review, but need to report to the competent agencies for approval before implementation.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Should the amount of travel expenses determined by the Railway Reconstruction and Engineering Bureau of the Ministry of Communications be approved by the Ministry of Communications or by the Railway Reconstruction and Engineering Bureau of the Ministry of Communications?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The amount of travel expenses set by the Railway Reconstruction Engineering Bureau of the Ministry of Communications should be implemented after approval by the Ministry of Communications.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the transportation expenses for business travelers who drive their own cars be calculated and reimbursed based on the driving distance?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The transportation expenses of self-driving cars for business travelers shall be reported in accordance with the provisions of item 3, point 5 of the key points for domestic travel expense reporting, and the transportation expenses may be reported according to the highest-level private passenger transportation fare for the same road segment. If there is no public transportation in the area or the public passenger transport fare of the same road for reference, you can refer to the private passenger transport fare and mileage in the adjacent area to report the transportation fee. Therefore, the method of calculating the reimbursement according to the driving distance should in principle be limited by the highest fare for private passenger transport on the same road segment.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the designated personnel who represent the chief minister participate in the farewell memorial ceremony for the people in other towns and towns apply for travel expenses reimbursement?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Designated personnel representing the head of state to participate in the farewell ceremonies for people in other villages and towns can only apply for travel expenses in accordance with the "Domestic Travel Expenses Reimbursement Key Points" when the service agency approves a business trip.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Based on financial considerations and budget control, is the standard for domestic travel expenses reimbursement set by the head of the agency legal?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: On the basis of financial considerations and budget control, the domestic travel expenses reimbursement standards set by the head of the agency are legal, as long as they do not exceed the reimbursement standards stipulated in the "Key Points for Domestic Travel Expenditure Claims". Local government agencies may, based on factors such as financial resources and business needs, refer to the key points for domestic business travel and travel expenses, and set their own relevant reporting and expense regulations within the scope of the key points.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: How should municipalities and counties (cities) refer to the regulations on domestic business trips and travel expenses for public servants of central government agencies that are allowed to take business or equivalent seats (cabins)?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The mayor of a municipality directly under the central government may refer to the standard of "ministerial level" for the class of transportation used for domestic business trips, and the deputy mayor of a municipality and the head of a county (city) may refer to the standard of the deputy head of the central ministry (that is, the sub-minister level). As for other personnel, they do not belong to the scope of claiming to take the business class (compartment) or the same seat (cabin).

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I have worked overtime during the business trip, can I apply for overtime pay?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, if you extend your work beyond normal working hours due to business needs during your business trip, you can apply for overtime pay according to regulations after being verified and assigned by your supervisor. However, you have to provide enough supporting documents to prove the fact of overtime work, and the overtime hours cannot include round-trip travel and accommodation and other non-executive duty time.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can I apply for compensatory leave for the travel time during the business trip?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Whether the travel time during the business trip can apply for compensatory leave needs to be considered by each agency based on business needs, geographical location, traffic conditions and other related factors. Each agency has the responsibility to decide whether to grant compensatory leave.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can representatives of local public opinion receive travel expenses when they attend government meetings?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Local public opinion representatives can receive travel expenses when a representative agency is designated by the chairman of the county (city) assembly or the chairman of the representative meeting to participate in government meetings. The payment standard for the part of parliamentarians is based on the expenses of civil servants with brief appointments, while the representative part is based on the expenses of recommended officials (currently stipulated as personnel below the brief appointment level) of civil servants.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the chairman of the villagers' representative association participate in weddings and funerals, can he claim for travel expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The chairman of the village representative association participated in the wedding and funeral celebrations. Since it is not an event organized by various agencies, travel expenses cannot be reported.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I work as a staff member of the sports meeting and is sent on a business trip at the same time, can I receive staff allowance and travel expenses at the same time?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When a public servant serves as a staff member during the sports meeting and is also sent on a business trip, he cannot receive staff allowances and travel expenses repeatedly. Funds should be paid according to the actual work performed.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the free exchange coupons obtained by using the Taiwan High Speed ​​Rail corporate member discounts be used for business trips?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, if the agencies have applied to join Taiwan High Speed ​​Rail Enterprise Members, they should make good use of the preferential measures provided by the company, and the free ride coupons obtained should be used first for official business trips, and at the same time, they should supervise their subordinates to establish a corresponding use mechanism , to save public money.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If you want to travel by car, do you need to explain the reason in advance?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: If you want to drive on a business trip by yourself, you need to explain the time, itinerary, place of stay, and why you must use your own car in the business trip request form in advance. Supervisors will review and approve on a case-by-case basis.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: What documents and schedules do I need to attach when claiming travel expenses by car in a field survey?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: When declaring travel expenses, it is necessary to provide relevant documents and attach a detailed application form for self-driving transportation expenses of business travelers. Relevant information such as grease fees, road (bridge) fees and parking fees should be recorded on the schedule.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: What is the basis for the calculation of the upper limit of the reimbursement amount for self-driving oil expenses in field investigations?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: The upper limit of reimbursement for oil expenses is calculated based on the total price of fuel consumption listed in the detailed application form for self-driving traffic expenses of business travelers.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can the reimbursement of self-driving transportation expenses for fieldwork include the expenses of other transportation means?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: No, the transportation expense report can only include the grease fee, road (bridge) fee and parking fee for self-use automobiles (machines), and cannot include the expenses of other means of transportation.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I drive my own car during a fieldwork trip, can I be reimbursed for grease, road (bridge) and parking fees?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, if you need to drive yourself due to lack of official vehicles when carrying out the research project, these expenses can be reimbursed. However, you have to fill out the "Application Form for Travel Expenses by Self-driving Vehicles for Business Travelers", paste the form on the expense voucher, and follow the administrative procedures. The supervisor of the unit will verify it and write it off for you.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: What should I do if the date of the receipt of the fuel fee for the field survey does not match the date of the business trip?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: In order to solve this problem, the reimbursement method has now been revised. Business travelers only need to fill in the "Application Form for Travel Expenses by Self-driving Vehicles for Business Travelers", and then paste the form on the expenditure voucher. After that, the unit supervisor will verify and confirm according to their rights and responsibilities, and then they can handle the verification and write-off, and there is no need to submit additional grease fee receipts.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: How to fill in the "Application Form for Travel Expenses for Business Travelers Self-driving"?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: It is necessary to fill in the relevant information on the "Application Form for Self-driving Traffic Expenses for Business Travelers", and then paste the form on the expenditure voucher sticking sheet. Afterwards, according to the administrative procedures, the supervisor of the unit will verify the confirmation, and then can handle the verification and write-off, and there is no need to attach a document for the oil fee.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: When going through verification and write-off, is it not necessary to provide the oil fee receipt?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, there is no need to provide the grease fee receipt when handling the write-off. As long as the business traveler fills out the "Application Form for Self-driving Traffic Expenses of Business Travelers" and pastes it on the expense voucher sticking sheet, after the verification and confirmation by the supervisor of the unit, the verification can be processed.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Can I claim the oil fee when I drive my own car to do fieldwork?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, when you drive yourself on a business trip to do fieldwork, you can claim the grease fee. However, it is necessary to meet the conditions that there are not enough official vehicles to dispatch and the renting of vehicles does not meet the economic benefits, and it is necessary to apply for driving a car for self-use and attach the "Application Form for Self-driving Transportation Expenses of Business Travelers" to handle travel expenses.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If the official car is not enough, can I drive my own car for a business trip and report the expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, if there are not enough official cars and renting a car is not economical, you can drive your own car for business trips and report expenses such as grease. But don’t forget to attach the “Application Form for Travel Expenses for Business Travelers Self-Driven” to handle the travel expense claim!

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: How to apply for reimbursement of self-driving transportation expenses?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: To apply for reimbursement of self-driving transportation expenses, first of all, the nature of the business trip must comply with the regulations, such as field investigation, field collection, and family visits. Next, you want to make sure that the official car cannot be dispatched, and the cost of renting a vehicle is not cost-effective. Finally, you have to fill out the "Application Form for Travel Expenses by Self-driving Vehicles for Business Travelers", and then attach this form to handle travel expenses reimbursement. If you rent a car for a business trip, remember to provide a verified report of the rental car oil fee.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If I rent a car for a business trip, can I also claim the oil fee? What proof do I need to provide?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: If you rent a car for a business trip, the grease fee can also be reimbursed. However, if you want to claim the expense, you need to provide relevant supporting documents to verify the cost of grease.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: Are the miscellaneous expenses for business trips in downtown Taipei (including Xizhi) paid according to the standard 1/4?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, incidental expenses for business trips in downtown Taipei (including Xizhi) are paid at 1/4 of the standard rate.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If the place of business trip is within 30 kilometers of our hospital, the miscellaneous expenses will be paid according to 1/2 of the standard, right?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, if the business trip is within 30 kilometers of the hospital, but not in the Taipei City area (including Xizhi), the incidental expenses will be paid at 1/2 of the standard.

Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.title: Court regulations
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.question: If the business trip is more than 30 kilometers away from the hospital, the miscellaneous expenses will be paid in full according to the standard, right?
Domestic travel expenses reimbursement.answer: Yes, when the business trip is more than 30 kilometers away from the Academia Sinica, the incidental expenses will be paid in full according to the standard.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Is this executive yuan regulation specifically used to stipulate the travel expenses of civil servants of various agencies for overseas business trips?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, this regulation is set up to stipulate the travel expenses of civil servants of various agencies traveling abroad.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: How does this Executive Yuan regulation define official business trips?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: According to this regulation, business trips for public servants refer to going abroad to perform one of the following tasks after being approved by the head of the agency: 1. Visiting abroad at the formal invitation of a foreign government, non-governmental organization or international organization; 2. Visiting in response to diplomatic needs; 3. Representing The government attends international conferences or negotiations; 4. Going abroad for investigation or inspection due to business needs; 5. Other official duties.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Do business trips have to be approved by the head of the agency?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, business trips must be approved by the head of the agency.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Which missions abroad can be considered business trips?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Business trips include the following types of tasks: first, to visit abroad at the official invitation of foreign governments, non-governmental organizations or international organizations; second, to conduct related visits in response to diplomatic needs; The business needs to go abroad for investigation or inspection; fifth, other official duties.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Does visiting a foreign country at the formal invitation of a foreign government count as a business trip?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, a visit abroad at the formal invitation of a foreign government also counts as a business trip.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If it is a diplomatic visit, can it be counted as a business trip?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, if a diplomatic visit is approved by the head of the agency, it is considered a business trip.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Does a government representative attending an international conference count as a business trip?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Government representatives attending international conferences are considered business trips.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Is it also included in the scope of business trips because business needs to go abroad for inspection?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, because business needs to go abroad for inspection is also part of the scope of business trips.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What kind of business trips abroad can be regarded as business trips?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Business trips that can be regarded as business trips include: visiting abroad at the formal invitation of foreign governments, non-governmental organizations or international organizations, conducting relevant visits in response to diplomatic needs, attending international conferences or negotiations on behalf of the government, and going abroad for investigation or inspection due to business needs, etc.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: How do business travelers arrange their itinerary according to the nature of the task and the actual needs?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: When arranging the itinerary, business travelers should try to keep the itinerary short according to the nature of the task and actual needs. Before going on a business trip, report the itinerary and the number of days to the head of the agency and get their consent. Return home cannot be postponed without prior consent unless there are special reasons.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Before a business trip, which agency head needs approval to determine the business trip itinerary and number of days?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Before a business trip, it is necessary to sign and report to the head of the agency, and after their approval, the business trip itinerary and number of days can be determined.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If there are reasons attributable to the traveler, how to deal with the delayed return of the itinerary?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If a business traveler has reasons not attributable to the business traveler and needs to extend the itinerary to return home, the head of the agency must be approved in advance.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What expenses are included in the travel expenses?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Travel expenses mainly include transportation expenses, living expenses and office expenses. Among them, the transportation expenses are the expenses of taking planes, ships and long-distance public land transportation means, the living expenses include accommodation expenses, meals and pocket expenses, and the office expenses cover the handling fees for going abroad, insurance fees, administrative fees, gift exchanges and miscellaneous expenses. The petty expenses in the living expenses include urban transportation ticket fees, credit card handling fees, laundry fees, tips and other living-related expenses. Gift communication and miscellaneous expenses include gift expenses, entertainment expenses, taxi fares and car rental fees, etc.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What does the petty expenses in living expenses refer to?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: The petty expenses in the living expenses mainly include urban train tickets, urban bus tickets, urban MRT tickets, personal credit card handling fees, laundry fees, tips and other expenses related to daily life.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What expenses are included in the gift communication and miscellaneous expenses in the office fee?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Gift communication and miscellaneous expenses in office expenses include gift expenses, communication expenses, taxi fares and car rental fees, etc.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What class of seats are available for ministers and special envoys?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Ministerial staff and special envoys take the highest class of seating.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What documents do I need to prepare for the reimbursement of transportation expenses by air?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: To report the transportation expenses by air, you need to prepare the following documents: ticket stub, electronic ticket or other documents proving the itinerary; international air ticket purchase certificate, travel agency collection and transfer receipt or other documents proving the payment of the ticket Documents; boarding pass stubs (including electronic boarding passes) or passport copies proving the fact of going abroad, and boarding certificates issued by airlines. In addition, other transportation expenses shall be reported and paid with the original documents or travel agency collection and transfer receipts.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: With regard to the daily living expenses table for business trips abroad, is it decided by the Executive Yuan?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, the schedule of living expenses for overseas business trips is determined by the Executive Yuan.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: In the distribution of daily living expenses, 70% is accommodation expenses, 20% is meal expenses, and the remaining 10% is pocket expenses, right?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, you are right! In the amount of daily living expenses, 70% is used to pay for accommodation, 20% is used to pay for meals, and the remaining 10% is used for pocket expenses.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If I participate in an international meeting or negotiation, and the accommodation expenses exceed 70% of the local daily living expenses, can I be reimbursed?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, as long as you are attending an international conference or negotiation on behalf of the government, and you live in a hotel designated by the sponsor or go on a business trip to a red warning area identified by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and the accommodation fee exceeds 70% of the local daily living expenses, you can be inspected Attach the relevant proof to report the account.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: When private enterprises and government officials go abroad for inspection together, is there any chance that the accommodation expenses will exceed 70%?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: When private enterprises and government officials go abroad for inspection together, if the accommodation expenses exceed 70% of the daily living expenses in the area, they can indeed verify the expenses with evidence. However, it should be noted that the maximum amount cannot exceed the daily living expenses in the area.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: When ministers go abroad, can they designate an accompanying person to enjoy the same accommodation expenses reimbursement standards?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, ministers can designate an accompanying person when they go abroad, and their accommodation expenses can be verified and reported according to the same standard.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Can I still claim living expenses if the foreign government provides meals and lodging?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If the foreign government provides meals and accommodation, but there is no other cash allowance or the cash allowance does not reach 10% of the daily living expenses in the area, you can also pay daily or make up for pocket expenses of 10% of the daily living expenses in the area .

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: How much can I claim for meals if only lodging is provided and no meals are included?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If only accommodation is provided but meals are not included, you can apply for meal expenses that are 20% of the daily living expenses in the area.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If the local cash allowance is less than 10% of the daily living expenses, how much can I make up for pocket expenses?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If the local cash allowance is less than 10% of the daily living expenses, you can make up for pocket expenses according to 10% of the local daily living expenses.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What percentage can I claim for my living expenses on the day of my return?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: For the living expenses on the day you return to your country, you can claim 30% of the daily living expenses in the area.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: How can I claim for unfilled meals if I have not eaten three meals?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If the meal does not reach three meals, you can claim the unserved meal expenses according to the percentage of the daily living expenses. 4% for breakfast, 8% each for lunch and dinner. This will allow you to make up the cost of meals that were not served.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What are the rules for reporting living expenses for business travelers who stay in the same place for more than one month?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If business travelers stay in the same place for more than one month, the rules for claiming living expenses are as follows: If they stay in the same place for more than one month but not more than three months, they can pay according to the living expenses of the area from the second month onwards. 80% of the daily allowance is reimbursed. If they stay in the same place for more than three months, starting from the fourth month, they can claim 70% of the daily living expenses in the area. However, this provision does not apply to those who represent the government at international conferences or negotiations, are sent to areas designated by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs as red alert for foreign travel, or plan to open embassies, consulates, representative offices or offices.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If I get sick or encounter an accident during the business trip and need to exceed the scheduled date, will I get additional living allowance?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If you get sick or encounter an accident during your business trip, which leads to the need to exceed the originally scheduled days, as long as you can provide valid proof and get the approval of the head of the agency, you can get daily living allowances.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What fees are included in the handling fees for business travelers going abroad?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: The handling fees for business travelers going abroad mainly include passport fees, visa fees, yellow book fees, vaccination fees, foreign exchange settlement fees and airport service fees. Remember to attach the original documents or the receipt of travel agency collection and transfer when submitting payment.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What kind of insurance do I need to apply for when traveling on business?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: When traveling on business, you need to apply for additional insurance items and coverages determined by the Executive Yuan, and attach the original insurance premium documents to verify the payment when reporting the payment.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What does the travel administrative fee include?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Administrative expenses for business trips mainly include materials, application, registration, post and telecommunications, translation and freight charges for performing official duties abroad.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What preparations do I need to make before going abroad to estimate the administrative expenses?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Before going abroad, you need to estimate the possible administrative expenses, such as materials, registration, registration, postage, translation and shipping. Then sign and report the estimated expenditure to the head of the agency for review, and then attach the original document or travel agency collection and transfer receipt to report the expenditure after approval.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What should I do if the budget is exceeded due to temporary business needs abroad?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If the budget is exceeded due to temporary business needs abroad, you should first explain the reasons, and then sign and report to the head of the agency for approval. After approval, you can report expenses together.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What is the limit for the reimbursement of gifts, communication and miscellaneous expenses when ministerial personnel lead a mission for less than 15 days?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: When a ministerial-level official leads a mission for less than 15 days, the limit for reimbursement of gifts, communication and miscellaneous expenses is NT$100,000.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: For those who are not on business trips led by personnel above the director level of the accompanying department, how much gifts, communication and miscellaneous expenses can each person claim per day?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Each business traveler can claim up to NT$600 for social gifts and miscellaneous expenses per day.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If a business traveler is sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment during the business trip and is not granted a fine or probation, how long does the business traveler need to return to China?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Business travelers shall return to China within one week from the day following the notification.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: What expenses do I need to report in detail within 15 days after the sale?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Within 15 days after the business trip is completed, you need to record all the expenses on the business trip report form in detail, including transportation, accommodation, meals and other expenses related to business trips, and record them daily. At the same time, relevant documents should also be attached for review by the agency in charge of review.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: How should the date and time of the business trip be calculated?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: The date and time of travel expenses should be calculated according to our own country's date and time, but if it is a call for personnel stationed abroad, then it does not need to be calculated in this way.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If there is no foreign exchange settlement before going abroad, what kind of exchange rate will the travel expenses be calculated according to?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If the foreign exchange settlement is not completed before the business trip, the travel expense report will be calculated according to the Taiwan bank's spot dollar reference exchange rate on the day before the trip (if it is a holiday, it will be pushed forward).

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If you need to pay the registration fee before going abroad, what exchange rate can you use to apply for payment?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If the application fee needs to be paid before the business trip, the payment can be made at the exchange rate on the day of the actual payment. If you pay by credit card, you can handle the reimbursement according to the exchange rate of credit card settlement.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: If the country of the business trip does not use US dollars, what exchange rate should be used for calculation when reporting expenses?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If the country of travel does not use US dollars, the payment should be calculated based on the local currency and with reference to the spot exchange rate of the currency sold by the Bank of Taiwan. If there is no spot exchange rate at which the Bank of Taiwan sells the currency, the cash exchange rate is used as the basis.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Does the local government have to follow the regulations of the Executive Yuan to report travel expenses for business trips abroad?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, the travel expenses of the local government on business trips to foreign countries shall be handled in accordance with the regulations of the Executive Yuan.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Do the regulations of the Executive Yuan allow the various competent agencies of the central government to set their own regulations on the payment of travel expenses abroad?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, the competent authorities of the central government can formulate their own regulations on the payment of travel expenses abroad within the scope specified in this point.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: I am going on a business trip to mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau, what are the procedures for reimbursement of travel expenses?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: For business trips to the mainland, Hong Kong and Macau, the procedures for reimbursement of travel expenses will be handled in accordance with the regulations on the key points of travel expenses for foreign business trips. As for the schedule of living expenses for business travelers, it is determined separately by the Executive Yuan.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: How is the daily allowance of living expenses for business trips in mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau calculated?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: The amount of living expenses for business trips in mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau is calculated according to a table separately formulated by the Executive Yuan. In terms of claiming travel expenses, refer to the main points of travel expenses for foreign business trips.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: When the new and old regulations are handed over, which regulation should be applied to the dispatched personnel during the business trip?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: The old regulations apply to business travelers during the old regulations, and the new regulations apply to the new regulations. However, if you have already booked air tickets and accommodation during the new regulations before the new regulations take effect, you can still use the old regulations.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Regulatory Amendments
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Ministerials get the highest class of seats, right?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer:
Yes, ministerial staff can travel in the highest class of seats. In addition, senior officials, ambassadors, ministers, permanent representatives, deputy permanent representatives, other specially appointed (assigned) personnel, and personnel with the full supervisory salary of each grade above the twelfth grade of the senior grade, who meet one of the following circumstances, may Take the highest class seat (cabin):
1. There are only two classes of seats (cabins) on boarding flights.
2. The flight does not have a first-class seat (cabin) and the flight (road) takes more than four hours.
3. Undersecretary-level personnel have diplomatic missions to visit or participate in important international conferences on behalf of the government.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Regulatory Amendments
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Except for ministerial personnel, special envoys, deputy ministerial personnel, ambassadors, ministers, permanent representatives, deputy permanent representatives, other special-appointed (assigned) personnel, and personnel with full supervisors at the twelfth rank and above, the rest People need to travel in base class (standard) seats, right?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, other people travel in base class (standard) seats.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Regulatory Amendments
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: In the attached table of the key points for foreign business trip travel expenses, it is necessary to fill in information such as the flight number, whether the cabin is divided into two classes, whether there is no first-class cabin, and whether the flight is more than 4 hours. Is this true?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Yes, according to the main points of overseas travel expenses reporting, the attached form should fill in information such as the flight number, whether the cockpit is divided into 2-class cockpit, whether there is a first-class cabin, and whether the flight is more than 4 hours. This can avoid cognitive disputes in the write-off process.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Regulatory Amendments
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: How do we apply the old and new regulations when traveling across the board?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: If the new and old regulations are exceeded during the business trip, it must be in accordance with the 23rd point of the key points for travel expense reporting abroad. The old regulations apply to the old regulations during the business trip, and the new regulations apply to the new regulations during the business trip. However, if you have already booked a ticket for the period of the new regulation before the new regulation takes effect, then the old regulation can apply.

Expenses for foreign business trips.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Expenses for foreign business trips.question: Can workers or contractors claim travel expenses in accordance with the "Key Points for Reimbursement of Travel Expenses Abroad"?
Expenses for foreign business trips.answer: Contractors can report foreign travel expenses in the same way as civil servants, but workers are not suitable for sending abroad, so they cannot claim foreign travel expenses.
