General expense reporting.question: How is the hourly fee calculated for lecture assistants who assist in teaching?
General expense reporting.answer: The hourly fee for lecture assistants who assist in teaching is calculated based on half of the hourly fee for lectures in the same course.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: According to which regulations are the hourly fee payment standards for lectures determined?
General expense reporting.answer: The hourly fee payment standard for lectures is set in accordance with the provisions of Appendix 7 of the Hourly Lecture Fee Payment Table promulgated by the Executive Yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to adjust the hourly fee for lectures to meet the budget and actual needs?
General expense reporting.answer: If you want to adjust the payment amount of the hourly fee for lectures to suit the budget and actual proposals, you can decide the amount of payment within the upper limit of the hourly fee for lectures of Academia Sinica according to the budget situation and actual needs. If it is a special study course, the international or domestic reputation of the lecture, academic status, content of the lecture, and difficulties in recruitment can be considered, and the appropriate amount of payment can be determined after approval by the dean.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: May I ask how long is the teaching time for each session? If there is less than one session, how to calculate the hourly fee?
General expense reporting.answer: Each lesson is 50 minutes. If there is less than one session, the hourly lecture fee will be halved.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to determine the remuneration standard for special lectures?
General expense reporting.answer: The remuneration standards for special lectures can be based on the Academia Sinica's "lecture fee", "translation fee", "promotion, re-employment, new hire case review fee", "major conference introduction fee, comment fee, interlocutor fee" It is determined by the payment standard of "revision and revision fee". At the same time, it is also necessary to consider the relevant conditions such as the reputation of the lecture at home and abroad, academic status, content of the speech, and the difficulty of recruitment to pay the remuneration.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: May I ask how to verify the payment of the transportation expenses and domestic accommodation expenses for external lectures?
General expense reporting.answer: Each unit can verify the transportation expenses and domestic accommodation expenses paid to external lectures according to the actual situation and in accordance with the relevant regulations on travel subsidies.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to pay for teaching materials if lectures need to be written or edited?
General expense reporting.answer: If the lecture needs to write textbooks, the textbook fee can be paid according to the Academia Sinica hourly fee payment standard.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the upper limit of the hourly lecture fee for externally hired domestic experts and scholars?
General expense reporting.answer: The upper limit of the hourly fee for externally hired domestic experts and scholars shall be handled in accordance with the provisions of the Academia Sinica’s hourly fee for lectures.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the upper limit of the hourly lecture fee for internal staff of Academia Sinica?
General expense reporting.answer: The upper limit of the hourly fee for lectures of internal staff of Academia Sinica shall be handled in accordance with the regulations of the hourly fee for lectures of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What kind of experts and scholars are recruited by this internal regulation?
General expense reporting.answer: This internal regulation is to recruit domestic and foreign scholars and experts in specific fields or outstanding, and let them participate in important research or management work of Academia Sinica, as well as academic development planning.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What grades are the recruited candidates divided into?
General expense reporting.answer: There are six levels, namely Nobel-level guest lectures, guest lectures and consultants, visiting professors, visiting associate professors, visiting assistant professors and visiting experts.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What are the required documents for applying for expert appointment?
General expense reporting.answer: The materials required to apply for the appointment of experts include research institute (department) business meetings, research center business meetings or the appointment of consultants in the headquarters of the institute, guest experts and scholar review team meeting minutes, appointment instructions, work plans, academic experience certification documents (photocopies), The resumes and representative works of the personnel to be hired, as well as other documents that are conducive to review, need to be submitted for review two months before the start date of employment.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How is the review process for the appointment of experts carried out?
General expense reporting.answer:
The review process is divided into the following steps:
1. For the initial and re-appointment of consultants, visiting experts and scholars at all levels in research institutes, research centers and the headquarters of the institute, the appointment period and the amount of remuneration shall be approved by the business meeting of the institute, the business meeting of the research center, or the extension of consultants and guest experts in the headquarters of the institute. Preliminary review by experts and scholars review group meeting.
2. The review team for recruiting consultants, guest experts and scholars in the headquarters is composed of the directors of various units in the headquarters, the accounting office, the personnel office, and the political style office, as well as the executive secretary of the Academic Advisory Association. The secretary-general serves as the convener.
3. After the preliminary review of the employment extension case is passed, it should be reviewed by the review team of the recruitment consultants, guest experts and scholars of the hospital. After passing the review, Chen asked the dean to approve the appointment.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How long is the duration of each extension?
General expense reporting.answer: The term of each extension is two years.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to arrange the remuneration and budgetary funds for the extension of experts?
General expense reporting.answer: There are two main arrangements for the remuneration and budgetary expenses of the hired experts. First of all, the remuneration for hired experts is paid in accordance with the provisions of the "Payment Standard Table for Academia Sinica's Recruitment of Consultants, Guest Experts, and Scholars". Secondly, the funds required for the recruitment of experts shall be covered by the budget prepared by the recruiting unit. If the retained specialist is a retired civil servant, the remuneration shall not exceed the statutory basic salary and the total paid employment period shall not exceed six years. However, experts who participate in the important planning and management work of the whole hospital are not subject to this restriction.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the agreement for the hired experts to temporarily leave Taiwan under special circumstances?
General expense reporting.answer: The agreement that the hired experts need to leave Taiwan temporarily under special circumstances is that the accumulative number of days abroad per year shall not exceed three weeks (excluding public holidays), and those whose employment period is less than one year shall be calculated on a pro-rata basis. If the number of days away from Taiwan exceeds three weeks, the corresponding unit should verify the withholding of work remuneration. However, if the research work involved is of a special nature and is really necessary, it can be reported to the hospital for reference after obtaining the consent of the employing unit.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What should I do if there is a change in the employment period?
General expense reporting.answer: If there is a change in the term of employment or other changes, it needs to be reported to the Academia Sinica for approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What documents should be signed by the recruiting unit and the experts?
General expense reporting.answer: The recruiting unit and the experts should sign the "Academia Sinica Recruitment Contract for Consultants, Guest Experts and Scholars".

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Do visiting personnel receive personal research funding and equipment?
General expense reporting.answer: Visiting staff cannot obtain research funds and equipment alone, but they can jointly implement special research projects of institutions inside and outside the Academia Sinica with full-time researchers of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What should be done if the candidate involved in the violation of academic ethics?
General expense reporting.answer: If the candidate involved in the violation of academic ethics, it should be dealt with in accordance with the "Academia Sinica Ethics Committee Setup and Operation Points".

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the revision and implementation process of Academia Sinica's appointment of consultants, guest experts and scholars?
General expense reporting.answer: The revision and implementation process of the assignment points for the appointment of consultants, guest experts and scholars by the Academia Sinica must first be approved by the academic affairs meeting, and then approved by the dean before implementation.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How much is the highest daily remuneration for Academia Sinica to invite Nobel-level guest lectures?
General expense reporting.answer: Refer to the Academia Sinica's payment standard table for hiring consultants, guest experts and scholars.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the maximum monthly remuneration for visiting professors hired by Academia Sinica after one year or more?
General expense reporting.answer: Refer to the Academia Sinica's payment standard table for hiring consultants, guest experts and scholars.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: May I ask how much money the Academia Sinica can get each month for hiring a visiting expert who has held the position for more than one year?
General expense reporting.answer: Refer to the Academia Sinica's payment standard table for hiring consultants, guest experts and scholars.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is the ticket class for Academia Sinica recruiting visiting assistant professors economy class?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the air ticket for visiting assistant professors is economy class.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the maximum total insurance premium for consultants, guest experts and scholars recruited by Academia Sinica?
General expense reporting.answer: Refer to the Academia Sinica's payment standard table for hiring consultants, guest experts and scholars.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Academia Sinica recruits consultants, visiting experts and scholars If the person who holds the position needs to apply for a higher air ticket class or living expenses, who should he apply for?
General expense reporting.answer: If you need to apply for a higher air ticket class or living allowance, you should apply to the headquarters of Academia Sinica and explain the specific reasons.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How many children under the age of 18 can be subsidized air tickets for the Academia Sinica employing consultants, guest experts and scholars who have served for more than one year?
General expense reporting.answer: Those who have served for more than one year can subsidize air tickets for up to two children under the age of 18.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the maximum limit of air ticket subsidy for returning to China to visit relatives for consultants, visiting experts and scholars who have been hired by Academia Sinica for more than five years?
General expense reporting.answer: Refer to the Academia Sinica's payment standard table for hiring consultants, guest experts and scholars.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Academia Sinica recruits consultants, visiting experts and scholars for more than two years. The relocation subsidy is divided into dependents and singles. How much is it respectively?
General expense reporting.answer: Refer to the Academia Sinica's payment standard table for hiring consultants, guest experts and scholars.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If the recruited personnel of Academia Sinica are not eligible for insurance and have no other personal insurance, how should they apply for international technical cooperation personnel insurance?
General expense reporting.answer: If the recruited personnel do not have insurance qualifications or other personal insurance, they can ask the recruiting unit to assist in the international technical cooperation personnel insurance during the employment period.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What's the most you can spend on souvenirs for a departing executive?
General expense reporting.answer: The maximum cost of souvenirs for the resigned Secretary-General or above of the headquarters of the Institute can be NT$10,000; the maximum cost of souvenirs for the retired directors and directors of administrative units, as well as the directors and directors of research institutes and centers can be up to NT$5,000.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How does Academia Sinica subsidize employees' mobile phone communication expenses?
General expense reporting.answer: Academia Sinica subsidizes mobile phone communication fees for employees in accordance with the "Principles for Handling Mobile Phone Communication Fees of the Executive Yuan and its affiliated agencies" and the supplementary regulations of Academia Sinica. Those who bear the mobile phone communication fee include some high-level executives such as the dean and deputy dean, as well as specific business undertakers. For the subsidy amount, please refer to the principles of the Executive Yuan and its affiliated agencies for handling mobile phone communication fees. If the limit is exceeded due to special business needs, the subsidy must be approved by the president or his authorized personnel. As for the mobile phone number borne by Academia Sinica, it needs to be registered in the name of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Who pays the dormitory telephone communication fees of the dean and vice dean?
General expense reporting.answer: The dormitory telephone communication fees of the dean and vice dean are paid by Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Can Academia Sinica employees apply for a subsidy for their residential telephone communication expenses?
General expense reporting.answer: Residential household telephone communication expenses cannot be subsidized.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Who can apply for Academia Sinica's mobile phone communication fee subsidy?
General expense reporting.answer: Academia Sinica subsidizes mobile phone communication fees for the dean, vice president, executive secretary and deputy executive secretary of the Academic Consulting Association, director and deputy director of the research institute, director and deputy director of the preparatory office of the research institute, director, deputy director and secretary general of the research center , Deputy Secretary-General, directors of various departments, offices, and central units, as well as the exclusive driving of the dean, vice-president and secretary-general. Undertakers of special business can also receive subsidies after being approved by the dean of the project signing application or his authorized personnel.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the upper limit of the subsidy for mobile phone calls for each position?
General expense reporting.answer: The upper limit of the subsidy shall be handled in accordance with the "Principles for the Handling of Mobile Phone Communication Fees by the Executive Yuan and its Subsidiary Agencies", and the subsidy shall be approved after approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: In what name should the phone number be registered for the mobile phone communication fee subsidy?
General expense reporting.answer: The phone number for the mobile phone communication fee subsidy must be registered in the name of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Who needs to approve the revision of the Supplementary Provisions of the Academia Sinica for the Handling Principles of Mobile Phone Communication Fees?
General expense reporting.answer: Amendments to this supplementary regulation need to be approved by the president of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If we want to buy more than 10,000 yuan of art to beautify the environment, do we need to budget it into the annual budget in advance?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, if you want to buy more than 10,000 yuan of artwork to beautify the environment, you need to include it in your annual budget first. After the purchase, it must be included in the property management.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If I need to use my personal credit card to pay official expenses, can it be written off?
General expense reporting.answer: Please follow the personal credit card payment regulations of the hospital.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Do I need to report to the hospital for approval to hold international conferences, seminars or handle various conferences and seminars in response to business needs?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, to hold international conferences, seminars or conduct various conferences and seminars according to business needs, if the venue is outside the Academia Sinica, it needs to be reported to the Academia Sinica for approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Can I use Academia Sinica fees to pay individual membership fees for joining international societies?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, but you need to report to Academia Sinica for approval first.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What should I do if the meal expenses for entertaining important visitors exceed the standard?
General expense reporting.answer: If the meal expenses for entertaining important visitors exceed the standard, you need to report to Academia Sinica and obtain approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Do I need to report for printing publicity materials?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the printing of publicity materials needs to be reported.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What materials need to be reported to the hospital for approval when conducting investigation visits?
General expense reporting.answer: The materials that need to be submitted to the hospital for approval when conducting investigations and visits include budget preparation, questionnaires and interview contents, implementation and write-off methods, and other materials.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: In order to promote business and target the general public, what information do I need to provide for verification if I need to purchase gifts or distribute cash?
General expense reporting.answer: When purchasing gifts or distributing cash, it is necessary to provide information such as budget preparation, business promotion plan content, nature, implementation and write-off methods.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to apply for the interview subsidy for overseas researchers?
General expense reporting.answer: To apply for a subsidy for overseas researchers to return to China for an interview, you need to ask the Academia Sinica for approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Do I need to report to the hospital for approval to hold special lectures?
General expense reporting.answer: If there is more than 1 series of lectures arranged by each institute (center), it must be reported to the institute for approval. In addition, special speech standards may not apply to special projects after approval by the dean.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How should the director or director lead a delegation to report for approval?
General expense reporting.answer: When the director or director leads a delegation on a business trip, if he wants to report gifts, communication and miscellaneous expenses, he needs to first determine whether the business trip belongs to leading a delegation, and then report to the hospital for approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to allocate and use the balance of the research plan of Academia Sinica?
General expense reporting.answer: For the allocation and use of the balance of the research project, please follow the ratio stipulated by the Academia Sinica for the treatment of the balance of the external subsidy or commissioned special research project.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: After the research project is completed, how is the distribution ratio of the balance fund calculated?
General expense reporting.answer: Please follow the ratio set by the Academia Sinica's external grants or entrusted special research project balance treatment principles.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: After the project host leaves or retires, what should I do with the balance?
General expense reporting.answer: When the project host resigns or retires, please follow the ratio set by the Academia Sinica's external subsidies or commissioned special research project balance processing principles.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What projects can research plan balances be used for?
General expense reporting.answer: The balance of the research plan can be used for projects related to technological research and development.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Which units are responsible for the management of the balance, and how to control it?
General expense reporting.answer: For the management of the balance, please follow the principles of handling the balance of the Academia Sinica's external grants or entrusted special research projects.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What procedures are required to amend the principle of handling the balance of the Academia Sinica's external grants or entrusted special research projects?
General expense reporting.answer: If there is any need to amend the principle of handling the balance of external subsidies or entrusted special research projects of the Academia Sinica, it needs to be approved by the director of the headquarter of the academy, and then submitted to the president for approval. The revised principles will take effect.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Can employee travel expenses be paid by personal credit card?
General expense reporting.answer: Employee travel expenses can be paid with personal credit cards.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is it possible to pay with a personal credit card when purchasing books online?
General expense reporting.answer: You can pay with your personal credit card when purchasing books online.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If I need to have dinner with foreign guests, can I use my personal credit card to pay less than 20,000 yuan?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, if you have a meal with foreign guests due to business needs, you can pay with your personal credit card.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If there is a special situation that requires a personal credit card to pay official expenses, how should it be reported?
General expense reporting.answer: If you need to use your personal credit card to pay official expenses under special circumstances, you should report the case to Academia Sinica first, and then proceed with the approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Should I apply for a government procurement card in order to avoid non-compliance with personal credit card payments?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, in order to avoid non-compliance with personal credit card payments, you should apply for a government procurement card.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the difference between the expenditure account allocation table and the expenditure agency allocation table?
General expense reporting.answer: Expenditure subject apportionment table means that when a payment is made, the expense voucher cannot be separated, but needs to be apportioned by multiple projects or subjects within the agency. The expenditure agency apportionment table means that when a payment is made, the expenditure voucher cannot be separated and needs to be apportioned by multiple agencies, and this expenditure agency apportionment table should be made.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How is the number of copies for making the apportionment form determined?
General expense reporting.answer: The number of copies of the apportionment table is determined according to the number of apportionment subjects or apportionment agencies. For example, if there are 3 subjects (or 3 institutions) to share, it is necessary to make 3 allocation tables.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: May I ask which apportionment form should the original documents of the whole case be attached to?
General expense reporting.answer: In the general case of the apportionment table of the expenditure agency, it should be attached to the expenditure certificate sticky deposit slip of the sponsoring agency. And if it involves the subsidy plan of the National Science and Technology Council of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture, the original copy of the original certificate must be attached to the sticky deposit slip of the expenditure certificate of the National Science and Technology Council of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is it necessary to attach the original receipt to the apportionment form of the expenditure agency to handle the write-off?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the expenditure agency allocation form needs to be accompanied by the original receipt for verification. But if it is shared with the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture, since the Academia Sinica usually does not issue a receipt, it can be written off as long as the apportionment form of the expenditure agency is attached.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If it involves subsidy programs of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture, where should the original voucher be attached?
General expense reporting.answer: If it involves the subsidy plan of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture, the original original voucher should be attached to the sticky deposit slip of the expenditure certificate of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What are the relevant regulations that need to be followed when printing weekly, monthly, annual calendars, notebooks or other promotional materials?
General expense reporting.answer:
When printing weekly, monthly, annual calendars, notebooks or other promotional materials, the following rules need to be followed:
1. It should be handled after drawing up the relevant budget, and should not be spent by other funds.
2. It must conform to the effectiveness of business promotion.
3. Clearly regulate the distribution objects, properly estimate the number of prints and list them for record management.
4. It is not allowed to print items with value or stored value, such as postage stamps, phone cards, etc.
5. It needs to be reported to the hospital for approval before it can be processed.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Are there snacks and bento provided during the briefing session?
General expense reporting.answer: The principle of not providing snacks and lunches is to hold general administrative business briefings or symposiums in the hospital area for colleagues in the hospital.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If I am an academician in mainland China, how much is the air ticket and remuneration for attending the academician meeting?
General expense reporting.answer: If you are an academician in mainland China, the air ticket to attend the academician meeting will subsidize the business class round-trip air ticket. As for the remuneration, please refer to the "Academia Sinica Academicians (Reviewers) come to the Academy to receive various remuneration payment standards".

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Will the remuneration be different if I participate in the pre-session seminar of the academician meeting?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the remuneration for attending a pre-session seminar is different from the remuneration for attending a fellowship meeting. Please refer to the "Academia Sinica Academicians (Reviewers) come to the Academy to work and receive various remuneration standards".

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: For foreign academicians who are invited to the academy to guide research, how to calculate the air ticket and remuneration?
General expense reporting.answer: For foreign academicians who are invited to the institute to guide their research, they will be subsidized for round-trip business class air tickets in terms of air tickets, and they need to verify the reimbursement. Remuneration (including living expenses) shall be paid within the scope of the "Maximum Standards for Payment of Foreign Consultants, Experts, and Scholars Employed by Various Agencies to Work in Taiwan" stipulated by the Executive Yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If it happens that the ticket needs to be refunded or exchanged due to a change in the itinerary, do you need a special signature for approval?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, if the ticket needs to be returned or exchanged due to changes in the itinerary, the subsidy can only be obtained after the project is signed and approved.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How much are councilors from mainland China or abroad paid when they participate in the council?
General expense reporting.answer: When reviewers from mainland China or abroad participate in the review meeting, please refer to the "Academicians of Academia Sinica (members) who come to the Academy to receive various remuneration standards for the remuneration part.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is there any subsidy for overseas candidate research and research technicians to return to China for interviews?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, Academia Sinica will provide subsidies for overseas candidate research and research technicians to return to China for interviews as appropriate.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What are the restrictions on the job titles of overseas candidate research and research technicians who return to China for interviews?
General expense reporting.answer: The job title limit for applicants is above that of Research Assistant and Research Technician.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Do overseas candidate research and research technicians need to make speeches when they return to China for interviews?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, candidates are required to give the required presentation during the interview.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the basis for determining the subsidy fees for overseas candidate research and research technicians returning home for interviews?
General expense reporting.answer: The standard of the subsidy fee is determined according to the proposed job title and according to the payment standard table for consultants, visiting experts and scholars hired by the Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Which unit will bear the subsidy for overseas candidate research and research technicians returning home for interviews?
General expense reporting.answer: These subsidies are borne by the employer.

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Is the subsidy for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic trainings or lectures aimed at regulating the related expense subsidies for the central government to send personnel to participate in various domestic trainings or lectures?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, the main point is to standardize the subsidy of related expenses for the central government to send personnel to participate in various domestic training or lectures.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Do training institutions need to provide accommodation facilities?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The training institution needs to provide necessary accommodation according to the course arrangement, the distance of the trainees, and the traffic conditions. If the training institution does not have accommodation facilities, it should contact other training institutions to borrow or entrust to provide accommodation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can the service organization subsidize the transportation and accommodation expenses of the trainees?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The service organization may, according to the actual situation, subsidize the trainees' transportation and accommodation expenses between the service organization and the training place. However, if the training institution has already provided transportation or accommodation, no subsidy will be given.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training institution has already provided transportation or accommodation, can I still apply for the subsidy?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training organization has already provided transport or accommodation, it is not possible to apply for a subsidy.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can I also apply for subsidies for transportation and accommodation expenses for seminars, symposiums, etc.?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, you can apply for a subsidy for transportation and accommodation expenses for seminars, symposiums and other activities.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can each agency formulate subsidy regulations on its own according to business needs?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Each agency may, based on business or other considerations, formulate subsidy regulations on its own within the scope of this key point for verification and discretion.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Are the old and new regulations applicable in different periods?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, the old and new regulations will apply at different times. If a training or workshop period spans the old and new rules, the old rule applies during the old rule and the new rule applies during the new rule.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Does this point also apply to subsidies for domestic training or lectures sent by state-owned enterprises and local governments?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, the subsidy for sending personnel from state-owned enterprises to participate in domestic training or lectures must also follow this point. Local governments can refer to this point to formulate their own regulations, and if they have not formulated regulations, they should follow this point.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What is the difference between the nature and basis of sending personnel to participate in training or lectures and being sent on business trips in the Executive Yuan’s Explanatory Compilation?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The nature and basis of being sent to a training or workshop is very different from that of a mission. Sending personnel to participate in training or lectures is based on the subsidy points for sending personnel to participate in various domestic trainings or lectures, and referring to the stipulated standards for domestic travel expenses reimbursement points, subsidizing them before and after training or lectures, from the service organization to the training institution Transportation expenses on departure and return days, and when the training institution does not provide the necessary accommodation, according to the accommodation vouchers submitted by the trainees, within the prescribed upper limit, subsidize their accommodation expenses. The dispatched domestic business trip is handled according to the key points of domestic business trip travel expenses. Therefore, the nature and basis of the two are different, and there is no competition.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I apply for training by myself, can I report the transportation expenses and food and miscellaneous expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you apply for the training by yourself, since it is not a training arranged by the agency, you can no longer report the transportation expenses and meal miscellaneous expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I am sent to domestic colleges and universities for advanced studies, can I receive travel expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you are sent to domestic colleges and universities for advanced studies, whether you can receive travel expenses depends on the regulations of your service organization. For example, if the training institution has provided more than two meals and accommodation every day, it can only subsidize round-trip transportation expenses. If the training institution does not provide accommodation, your service institution can subsidize the round-trip transportation and accommodation expenses for you according to the actual situation. In short, you must follow the relevant regulations of your institution.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Concerning the doubts about the use of "Key Points for Domestic Travel Expense Claims" and "Key Points for Subsidizing Expenses for Various Domestic Training or Lectures", how do you clarify the difference between standard employees and agencies?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer:
As for the doubts about the use of "points for domestic travel expenses reimbursement" and "points for subsidizing expenses for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic trainings or lectures", we can clarify the difference between standard employees and agencies from the following two points:

1. "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Trips" and "Key Points for Subsidizing Expenses for Various Domestic Trainings or Lectures" are mainly to regulate employees of various organs. Expenditure regulations.

2. In the letter of the Executive Yuan on December 22, 2013, it was aimed at various meetings and training sessions for agencies. If it is not possible to do it at a public venue or a training institution due to insufficient space, the institution will review the expenditure standard of the relevant expenses based on this when evaluating whether it is necessary to provide meals for the participants.

Combining the above two points, it can be seen that these regulations regulate the two different subjects of "employees" and "organizations". Therefore, employees of various agencies participate in various meetings and lectures and trainings, regardless of whether the location is in a public venue or a training institution, they should follow the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel" and "Key Points for Subsidizing Expenses for Various Domestic Trainings or Lectures by All Agencies" regulations.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: May I ask if the accommodation equipment of the training institution that the employees attend is entrusted to a specific hotel, can they choose not to stay and apply for accommodation subsidy according to the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel"?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: No, because the nature of "domestic business trip" and "domestic training or lecture" are different. Business trips are to perform certain tasks, and the required expenses are borne by the government; training or lectures are in the nature of public holidays, and the government only provides partial subsidies, and the insufficient part needs to be borne by employees themselves. Therefore, if employees choose not to live in the hotel arranged by the training institution, they should handle the accommodation problem by themselves and cannot apply for accommodation subsidy from the institution.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training period does not exceed 5 days, can the training institution provide lunch expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training period does not exceed 5 days, the training institution may decide whether to provide lunch according to the actual situation, but shall not subsidize the meal expenses of the trainees.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What should we do if the training institution does not provide board and lodging for more than 5 days?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training exceeds 5 days and the training institution does not provide accommodation, they should consult or entrust other training institutions to provide accommodation. If the training institution is still unable to provide accommodation, your service institution can subsidize the accommodation fee according to the actual situation, but it must be within the daily limit, and relevant accommodation fee vouchers must be provided.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can personnel who participate in training at night receive transportation subsidies?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Those who participate in training at night can receive transportation subsidies. Because as long as the training is arranged by the service organization, there is a training notification document, and you have really participated in the training, you can apply for round-trip transportation subsidies. Even if the training is done at night, there is no need to ask for leave and you can still receive subsidies.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can the job agent during the training period get overtime pay or compensatory leave and round-trip transportation expenses when handling urgent official duties?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: During the training period, when the agent returns to school on the second day of the week to work overtime to deal with urgent official duties, he can claim the round-trip transportation expenses according to the regulations. However, in terms of overtime pay or compensatory leave, this text does not explicitly mention it.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I travel from Chiayi to Kaohsiung for training, how will the transportation cost be calculated?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you start from Chiayi to Kaohsiung for training, the transportation fee will be reported according to the actual transportation, such as plane, high-speed rail, train, car, etc. Therefore, you only need to report the transportation expenses according to the actual amount spent.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I travel from the residence to the training center, can the transportation expenses be reimbursed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you go from the residence to the training platform, because it is on the way and can save public funds, so if there is no transportation fee actually incurred, you don’t need to report it again.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I did not apply for accommodation, can my daily round-trip transportation and meals be reimbursed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you do not apply for accommodation, the part of the transportation expenses can be reimbursed for the round-trip transportation expenses between the service institution and the training institution before and after participating in the training. Currently, the subsidy for meal expenses has been deleted.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I voluntarily give up my board and lodging in the training institution, can I still claim the board and lodging expenses from the service organization?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you voluntarily give up your board and lodging at the training institution, you will not be able to claim the board and lodging expenses from the service organization. However, as for the transportation expenses, you can still apply for a subsidy for the round-trip transportation expenses from the service organization to the training institution before and after you participate in the training.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: During the training or lecture period, according to what regulations will the service organization subsidize our transportation expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: During the training or lecture period, the service agency will subsidize your transportation expenses between the service agency and the training institution on the day of departure and return according to the provisions of the third point of "Subsidy Points for the Expenses of Various Agencies Sending Personnel to Participate in Domestic Training or Lectures".
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If you come from afar to participate in the training, and investigate the trainees' willingness to provide board and lodging, how should the board and lodging be reimbursed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the trainees come from far away to participate in the training, the training institution will ask the trainees whether they need accommodation when investigating the accommodation needs of the trainees. If the trainee chooses not to use the board and lodging, he is voluntarily giving up the right to board and lodging, so he cannot claim the board and lodging fee from the service agency. As for the transportation expenses, only the round-trip transportation expenses from the service organization to the training institution before and after the training can be claimed, and other expenses will not be subsidized. Therefore, the cost of board and lodging shall be reimbursed according to the choice of the trainee and the above principles.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I still need to go back to the service organization to work after the weekly training, and go to the training organization next week, how will the transportation subsidy be calculated?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you have to return to work in the service organization after the weekly training, and then go to the training institution next week, this situation is similar to the situation in which trainees return to the service organization to handle official duties during the training period. Therefore, according to the actual situation, your service agency can subsidize the transportation expenses between the service agency and the training institution after the return date. If your local council has its own rules, follow those rules.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training institution does not provide accommodation, can the service institution subsidize our daily round-trip transportation expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training institution does not provide accommodation and has to go back and forth every day, according to the regulations, the service institution can subsidize the transportation expenses between the service institution and the training location, but the amount of subsidy shall not exceed the daily upper limit of accommodation expenses stipulated in the main points of domestic business travel expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the two-day round-trip ticket price is cheaper than the outbound transportation fee, accommodation fee and return transportation fee on the first day, can I claim the two-day one-day round-trip ticket price?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: According to regulations, if the training institution does not provide accommodation and has to go back and forth every day, it can subsidize the transportation expenses between the service institution and the training location, but the amount of subsidy shall not exceed the daily upper limit of accommodation expenses stipulated in the main points of domestic business travel expenses. If the training institution has provided the necessary accommodation, if the trainees choose not to stay, they will not be subsidized for the accommodation fee and round-trip transportation during the training period, but only the starting and return transportation expenses before and after the training.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: During the basic training period, if the agency requires me to go back to participate in the badminton match and then return to the training place, can I apply for the high-speed rail transportation subsidy?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you are participating in a badminton match on behalf of the agency and have the fact that you have to take transportation, then the agency can subsidize your transportation expenses between the service agency and the training agency according to the subsidy points. Alternatively, the agency can also pay for it under its annual budget for cultural and recreational activities. Therefore, you can apply for high-speed rail transportation subsidies.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can I get the transportation fee to the training institution while going to the training on the public holiday on the day of my appointment?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, you can receive the transportation fee to the training institution while going to the training on the public holiday on the day of taking office. According to the provisions of the "Key Points for Subsidizing Expenses for Personnel from Various Agencies to Participate in Various Domestic Trainings or Lectures", the service agency can subsidize your transportation expenses. However, this still needs to be based on the regulations of your service agency, so it is recommended that you confirm the specific method with them.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: During the training period, the institution has already provided board and lodging and accommodation for the previous day, so after the training, can the trainees claim for round-trip transportation expenses, one-day accommodation expenses and food and miscellaneous expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Regarding the question you mentioned, according to relevant regulations, if the training institution has provided more than two meals and accommodation per day during the training or lecture period, the service institution only needs to subsidize the round-trip transportation expenses. For the day when the training ends, if the training institution does not provide accommodation, it means that the training does not need to provide accommodation on the day of the end of the training. The service organization of the trainees can consider the actual situation and decide whether it is necessary to pay the accommodation fee. The current regulations have already No food and miscellaneous subsidy items. In addition, in terms of reimbursement, the service organization needs to consider the nature of the training and assess whether it is necessary to stay again after completing the training, and the trainees should report the relevant expenses according to the actual situation. Each agency can also formulate internal regulations within the prescribed scope and strictly implement them according to its own business characteristics or other factors.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Does this service help to subsidize the expenses of agency personnel participating in various trainings or lectures?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, this service is mainly to help subsidize some expenses of government personnel who participate in domestic training or lectures. However, it should be noted that if the training institution has already provided board and lodging, no subsidy is required; if the training institution does not provide board and lodging due to course arrangements or trainees’ journey, no subsidy is required in this case. As for the meal allowance, it has been cancelled.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can the handling fee for remittance transfer of accommodation expenses be included in the travel expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the handling fee for remittance and transfer of accommodation expenses is on a business trip, it can be included in the miscellaneous expenses of the travel expenses, but it cannot be double-reported. However, in the case of participating in training or lectures, the handling fee does not belong to the subsidy category and cannot be included in the travel expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Should I apply for a public holiday or a business trip to participate in seminars, symposiums and other activities?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Participation in seminars, symposiums and other activities of the nature of training or lectures shall be granted official leave in accordance with the leave rules for civil servants. If participating in these activities is assigned by the agency to perform certain tasks, then a tolerance will be given. As for the payment of expenses, it should be treated as a public holiday or tolerance and handled in accordance with the corresponding regulations. However, local governments or agencies can also formulate their own internal regulations within a certain standard range based on factors such as financial resources and business characteristics.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: In terms of expense reporting, should the calculation be based on the "points for subsidizing expenses for personnel sent by various agencies to participate in various domestic trainings or lectures" or "points for reporting expenses for domestic business trips"?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Expenses should be reported according to the nature of the activities to be participated in. If it is a public holiday, it should be calculated according to the "points for subsidizing the expenses of various domestic training or lectures sent by various agencies"; Points" to calculate. However, each local government or agency (institution) may, based on financial resources, business characteristics or other considerations, formulate internal regulations within the above-mentioned prescribed standards and handle them at their own discretion.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can local governments or agencies set their own payment standards according to the actual situation?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, each local government or each agency may, based on financial resources, business characteristics or other considerations, formulate internal rules and regulations within relevant regulations and standards.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: How does the Executive Yuan Interpretation Compilation determine whether various meetings are of the nature of training lectures?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: According to the Executive Yuan’s compilation of explanations, to determine whether various meetings are of the nature of training seminars, it can be determined according to the instructions in the training letter or meeting notice issued by the sponsoring organization, or by the service organization of the participants themselves to assess the actual situation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What content should the organizer indicate on the training letter or meeting notice to determine the nature?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: In the training letter or meeting notice, the sponsoring agency needs to indicate that seminars, symposia and other activities are of the nature of training lectures, so that the service agency of the participants can determine the nature of the activity according to the actual situation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the service agency decides on its own based on the actual situation, is there any suggestion or standard that can be referred to?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: As for the service agency to determine whether the seminar and other activities are of the nature of training seminars based on the actual situation, you can refer to the instructions on the training letter or meeting notice issued by the sponsoring agency. In addition, it can be judged based on the content, purpose, and participants of the activity. If it involves learning new knowledge, skills, or professional exchanges, etc., and helps the participants improve their work, it can be identified as a training lecture Activity.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can I claim the incidental expenses for my business trip to attend the seminar?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the seminar you attend is not of the nature of lecture training, and the agency approves that you participate in a business trip, then your miscellaneous expenses can be reimbursed. It is right to follow the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel".
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can the incidental expenses be claimed for two or three days of seminars, workshops, and briefings held by educational institutions or schools on a business trip?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: cannot. According to regulations, after participating in such activities, there will be a study note indicating the number of study hours, and the participants are considered students, so they cannot report miscellaneous expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: When civil servants are sent to participate in training or lectures, should they be classified as business trips or public holidays?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: When public servants participate in training or lectures, if they meet the reasons for official leave listed in Article 4 of the Rules for Requesting Leave for Public Servants and are of a tolerance nature, or they are dispatched by the agency and meet the regulations on official leave, they will be registered as official leave and marked with tolerance nature.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If employees sign up for seminars or seminars by themselves, can they claim transportation and accommodation expenses according to the regulations?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If employees sign up for seminars or seminars by themselves, they cannot claim transportation and accommodation expenses according to the regulations. Because this regulation is for employees dispatched by the agency to participate in training or lectures. Therefore, if you participate by yourself, you cannot apply for related fee subsidies.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I want to sign up for the training quota held by the Human Resources Development Institute of the General Office of Personnel and Administration of the Executive Yuan, can I enjoy public holidays, transportation and accommodation subsidies?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you sign up for the training quota organized by the Human Resources Development Institute of the General Office of Personnel and Administration of the Executive Yuan, you will not be entitled to public holidays, transportation, and accommodation subsidies because you are not designated by the agency in accordance with relevant administrative procedures.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I attend a full-day or half-day seminar, as well as a meeting of another institution, will my travel expenses be reimbursed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer:
If you participate in full-day or half-day seminars and meetings of other organizations, the travel expense reimbursement depends on the situation. If the training is registered as a public holiday and does not have the nature of a business trip, the travel expenses cannot be paid, but it belongs to the nature of training lecture expenses. If the training institution does not provide board and lodging, you can get subsidies when you need to pay for it yourself.

As for the part of attending the meeting, it should be judged whether it has the nature of tolerance according to the business characteristics of the organization you belong to. If it is a business trip, you can claim the travel expenses in accordance with the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Trips".
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training institution does not provide accommodation, can I get a subsidy for the accommodation fee?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, if the training provider is supposed to provide accommodation but does not, then you will be able to get assistance with the cost of accommodation if you need to pay for it yourself.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What are the specific identification criteria for employee business trips?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The specific identification standard for employees on business trips is to see whether they handle general official duties or specific work plans, and register as official (trip) business trips or add the nature of business trips in official holidays. Only employees who meet these conditions can receive travel expenses in accordance with the provisions of the key points for domestic travel expenses reporting.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training or lecture exceeds 5 days, will the training institution provide accommodation?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training or lecture exceeds 5 days, the training institution will provide accommodation, unless there are special circumstances. If the training institution does not have accommodation facilities, it is the responsibility to find other training institutions for assistance.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What if the training institution does not have accommodation facilities?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training institution does not have accommodation facilities, it should consult or entrust other training institutions to provide accommodation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can I apply for miscellaneous expenses when I am sent on a domestic business trip for 1 day?
